basics.name: Omar BARKALLAH
basics.label: System Administrator - DevOps Engineer
basics.summary:
With a solid background in Sys Admin and Cloud DevOps roles, I specialize in optimizing cloud infrastructures and building scalable, cloud-native applications.
My skills span resource provisioning, automation, and CI/CD pipeline orchestration. I bring efficiency and innovation to your team, eager to contribute to your company's success.

  • DevOps Engineering
  • Cloud/AWS
  • System Administration

work.summary: Part of the SA/DevOps team, I'm helping StratisWorldwide to manage & secure their systems.
Im helping Fogits deliver the best experience to their customers.
Started working for myself, providing expertise on software development and DevOps culture and best practices for international startups.
Started my first professional developer experience as a Web Developer for INREGREF
